Reservation Menu

About

“We prepare and serve high quality, simple food, at a great value, in a home-like environment.”

As is the way, with our unique philosophy of combining a different atmosphere with our products we have done away with the traditional bar and restaurant experience. The new restaurant is fully equipped in an open kitchen and it is also open to our guests’ children and adults, with the option to bring them with us. We will be open from 7-20 May 2016. From the start, the restaurant was designed to be a relaxed, homely atmosphere.
